system.description: The true wonder seeker, these mages are the philosophers of the world, always seeking out more knowledge and more wisdom. The Storm Mage is a logician, a tactical intellectual who prefers to neutralize opponents rather than destroy them. Often cold, the Storm Mage is also tumultuous and crafty. If you are playing a Storm Mage, be curious, hungry for information, always in the clouds, tricky and clever, eluding rather than confronting.

overview.base: Having mastered the basic techniques in this field of magic, you are able to cast more advanced @L[Category:Spells]{spells}. If you create any @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} @L[Category:Spells]{spells} of your own, they get added to this list. However, just because you "know" how to cast these spells, doesn't mean you are always prepared to. Although all @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes} grant their own elder sorcery and rotator spells, you may only have a maximum of 2 × (@L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} - 1) of these spells rotated into your spell list at any given time across all classes. @L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} refers to the number of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{ranks} you have in @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes}. During a @L[Core:Long Rest]{long rest}, you can "rotate" which spells you have prepared. The @L[Category:Rotator spells]{rotator spells} automatically available to you are @L[Ability:Crown of Ice]{Crown of Ice}, @L[Ability:Dispel Magic]{Dispel Magic}, @L[Ability:Displace]{Displace}, @L[Ability:Resist Effects]{Resist Effects}, and @L[Ability:Spell Trigger]{Spell Trigger}.
overview.proficient: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.
overview.fluent: You may instead prepare @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} of these @L[Category:Spells]{spells}.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Elder Sorcery Creation]{Elder Sorcery Creation}, @L[Ability:Celestial Elder Sorcery Words]{Celestial Elder Sorcery Words}, and @L[Ability:Storm Elder Sorcery Words]{Storm Elder Sorcery Words}.
A small circle of glowing frost circles above your head. You gain @L[Ability:Shock Touch]{Shock Touch} and @L[Ability:Blizzard Aura]{Blizzard Aura}.

You may create 1 custom "rotator" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} using @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} words that you know using whatever @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} creation rules are dictated to you by your @L[Core:GM]{GM}. As with other rotators, this spell is not always available to you. You have to "rotate" into having it prepared. This spell may have a maximum number of words equal to your @L[Core:Leveling Up]{level}. Your @L[Core:GM]{GM} may allow you to "improvise" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} as well, using whatever rules they wish.
overview.proficient: You may now create 2 × (@L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} - 1) custom "rotator" @L[Category:Spells]{spells} where @L[Category:Mage classes]{MR} is the number of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{ranks} you have in @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage classes}.
overview.fluent: In addition to the spells that you crate, you can learn @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} additional spells from other @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} users. See @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{Elder Sorcery} for more information.

value.variable: Creation cost is at least 1 @L[Core:MP]{MP} per @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of each word in the spell plus 3 × @L[Core:MP]{MP} of the spell itself.
Creation cost is at least 3 × @L[Core:HP]{HP} of the spell itself.

costs.materialCost: Creation cost is at least 3 × the material components of the spell itself.

results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d4[magic ice]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} as well.
system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's actions, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base:
You know @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} 1 @L[Core:Celestial Elder Sorcery Words]{Celestial Elder Sorcery words}.
OP 1 Celestial @L[Core:Elder Sorcery Words]{Elder Sorcery Words}
OP Celestial Adjectives Celestial Adverbs Celestial Articles Celestial Conjunctions Celestial Nouns Celestial Prepositions Celestial Pronouns Celestial Verbs
1 bad as an as color by me are
big carefully one but cup for my be
bright here the or dagger in that begin
clean pretty so foot of this did
little then hand off you may
long there hat on your might
short today skin to stand
small torch tend
this wand use
overview.proficient: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P}).
overview.fluent: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F}).

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, deal an additional [[/damage 1d4[magic ice]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} as well.
system.endCondition: At the start of each of the target's actions, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base:
You know @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} 1 @L[Core:Storm Elder Sorcery Words]{Storm Elder Sorcery words}.
OP 1 Storm @L[Core:Elder Sorcery Words]{Elder Sorcery Words}
OP @L[Class:Storm Mage]{Storm Nouns} @L[Class:Storm Mage]{Storm Verbs}
1 attention cool
breeze distract
cloud float
drop identify
mind look
mist read
sand slow
study speed
vision stun
overview.proficient: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P}).
overview.fluent: The @L[Core:Elder Sorcery]{OP} of words you know is 1 + (3 × @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F}).

overview.proficient: You may now use Dispel Magic @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} additional times as a @L[Category:Free reaction abilities]{free reaction} before the start of your next turn. These additional uses do not in turn allow for additional uses.
overview.fluent: You may now use Dispel Magic @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} additional times as a @L[Category:Free reaction abilities]{free reaction} before the start of your next turn. These additional uses do not in turn allow for additional uses.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, the range of Dispel Magic increases by 10 feet.
system.endCondition: The start of your next turn.
system.trigger: A @L[Category:Conjured spells]{conjured spell} is used within range.

overview.base: You are instantly transported to a location you can see within range.

system.heightened: For each additional @L[Core:MP]{MP} spent, the range increases by 10 feet.
system.trigger: You cast a @L[Category:Missile delivery spells]{missile} or @L[Category:Weapon delivery spells]{weapon delivery spell}.

overview.base:
Pick one of the following @L[Category:Effects]{effect types}. You @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} @L[Category:Effects]{effects} of that type.
  1. @L[Category:Awakening effects]{Awakening effects}
  2. @L[Category:Control effects]{Control effects}
  3. @L[Category:Displacement effects]{Displacement effects}
  4. @L[Category:Duel modifying effects]{Duel modifying effects}
  5. @L[Category:Financial effects]{Financial effects}
  6. @L[Category:Healing effects]{Healing effects}
  7. @L[Category:Killing effects]{Killing effects}
  8. @L[Category:Knockout effects]{Knockout effects}
  9. @L[Category:Loud effects]{Loud effects}
  10. @L[Category:Mental effects]{Mental effects}
  11. @L[Category:Poison effects]{Poison effects}
  12. @L[Category:Reanimation effects]{Reanimation effects}
  13. @L[Category:Regeneration effects]{Regeneration effects}
  14. @L[Category:Revitalization effects]{Revitalization effects}
  15. @L[Category:Revival effects]{Revival effects}
  16. @L[Category:Stealing effects]{Stealing effects}
  17. @L[Category:Summoning effects]{Summoning effects}
  18. @L[Category:Temporal effects]{Temporal effects}
  19. @L[Category:Transformation effects]{Transformation effects}
  20. @L[Category:Truth detecting effects]{Truth detecting effects}
You cast one @L[Category:Single action spells]{single action spell} you have that is not @L[Category:Item delivery spells]{delivered by an item}.
